title: Braised Brisket And Cabbage Dumplings
summary: Braised Brisket And Cabbage Dumplings is a dairy free main course. This recipe serves 2. For $6.83 per serving, this recipe covers 73% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One serving contains 1541 calories, 120g of protein, and 36g of fat. A mixture of water, onion, bouquet garni, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. To use up the cabbage you could follow this main course with the Cabbage That Tastes Like Dessert! as a dessert. This recipe is liked by 10 foodies and cooks. Hanukkah will be even more special with this recipe. This recipe is typical of Jewish cuisine. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 3 hours and 11 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 97%. This score is great. Try Brisket with Vidalian Onion Puree and Meme's Braised Cabbage, Smoked Beef Brisket With Sauerkraut and Dumplings, and Braised Brisket for similar recipes.
